title: "Yay, finally got a 3rd key frag!  Time to open a chest and see what cool thing I got!"
body:
-opens chest-

-gets an emote-

Literally the story of my last two chests.  I know free stuff is free but.....when I get like 4-5 chests a year, getting emotes twice when I don't even use emotes and actively hate the fact that emotes were added to the game makes it feel like Riot is rigging/trolling my drops.

Oh well I guess, it's still free =P
